data.name: lpjmlkit
data.description: A collection of basic functions to facilitate the work with the DGVM LPJmL hosted at the Potsdam Institute for Climate Impact Research.     It provides functions for running LPJmL, as well as reading, processing and writing model-related data such as inputs and outputs or configuration files.

license.name: GNU Affero General Public License v3.0

evidence: "R package **lpjmlkit**, version **1.7.11**" and CRAN badge link indicate it is an R package intended to be installed and used as a library, i.e., a dependency.

"It provides functions for performing LPJmL simulations, as well as reading, processing and writing model-related data such as inputs and outputs or configuration files." shows it directly runs simulations and processes model data for research.
